# Skill: Documentation & Manuals
Focuses on manuals, specs, and README assets in this repository.

## Purpose
- Maintain manuals in `docs/*.tspec.md` and keep EN/JP parity.
- Update spec references and Troubleshooting sections when behavior changes.

## Workflow
1. Identify the target document (manual, testcases, README, release notes).
2. Update both EN and JP variants where applicable.
3. Record major doc changes in `docs/Knowledge.md`.
